pull.title: ci: Fix COMMIT_RANGE variable value for cloned repos
pull.body:
This change is split out from #20697 as [requested](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20697#discussion_r545826069) by **MarcoFalke**, and allows using lint task in forked repos with personal Cirrus CI accounts.

Based on #20697, only the last commit should be reviewed.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20697 (ci: Fix COMMIT_RANGE variable value by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
@MarcoFalke Any hint why Cirrus CI is not triggered by this pull?
Sorry, no. Though, this has to wait on #20697 anyway

This pull did not trigger Cirrus CI build for unknown reasons.
So it is closed in favor of #20728.
